name: Don't Drink The Orangeade
description:
Ever wanted to create a cult? Thought you could do it through the power of rhythm action? Desired the power to get people to drink your brand of orangeade?

Wonder no more. Single or multiplayer. Convert dancers to your cause then take them to the promised land by getting them to drink your patented moon juice.

Playable with 360 or Xbox One pads.
